name: GRIEF (itch) (rurounikz)
description:
GAME INSTRUCTIONS: 

- PC: Search around for clues pressing "Z" to get out of your room.

- Mobile: Search around pressing "A" looking for clues.

It's a beautiful day outside, but you can't go out... not until you confront your feelings first.

In GRIEF you'll explore a replica of my room as a kid. Each item has a meaning and gives a little understanding into my feelings when I was growing up. 

I was inspired by the theme of Global Game Jam 2022 (DUALITY). This prototype was a great opportunity to study Pixel Art, GB Studio, Tiled, basic level design and exercise my narrative design skills.

Follow me on Twitter: @edu_emm
